prompt: Create a minimalist feedback form with a clean white background and green accent colors, emphasizing simplicity and ease of use. The design should feature a flat, borderless header with just the text 'Feedback' in large, thin typography. Below, arrange form elements with generous white space: a simple underlined text input for name, an email field with subtle green underline, radio buttons for feedback type selection (Positive, Neutral, Negative) with custom green indicators, a clean text area with minimal border styling for comments, and an emoji-based rating system (😞😐😊😍🤩) for user experience rating. Include a simple green text button at the bottom with subtle hover effects. Focus on typography hierarchy and breathing room between elements.
